pages.title: Rarities
pages.text: There are five (5) levels of rarity that apply to chests, keys, locks, loot tables and structures: $(6)COMMON$(0), $(6)UNCOMMON$(0),$(6)SCARCE$(0),$(6)RARE$(0), and $(6)EPIC$(0). You can see an item's rarity (and other attributes) by hovering over the item in your inventory.

images: show hover of wooden chest here
